com.detroitlabs.katalonmobileutil.component

Class ComponentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.detroitlabs.katalonmobileutil.component.ComponentFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MobileComponentFactory, WebComponentFactory

    public abstract class ComponentFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates Components based on the target platform.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Finder finder
      The finder to use for getting TestObjects from the Object Repository.

      • getComponentFactory

        public static ComponentFactory getComponentFactory()

        Returns:
